data.name: Thor (Infinity War)
data.description: Thor, the God of Thunder, wields Stormbreaker to face cosmic threats, dealing heavy damage and breaking down enemy Protectors.

starItems.name: Thor (Infinity War)
starItems.description: Thor, the God of Thunder, wields Stormbreaker to face cosmic threats, dealing heavy damage and breaking down enemy Protectors.

3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary target
Clear a negative effect from self

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing.

Clear a negative effect from self.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> Piercing.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> Piercing + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from the primary target.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from the primary target.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from the primary target.

Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>4</color> positive effects from primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>4</color> positive effects from the primary target.

Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent enemies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies, clear <color=#86e619>4</color> positive effects from the primary target.

Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Clear all positive effects from primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies, clear all positive effects from the primary target.

Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies, clear all positive effects from the primary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.

4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear all Barrier from all enemies
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to all enemies

5.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear all Barrier from all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>440%</color> Piercing.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

6.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear all Barrier from all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>560%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

7.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear all Barrier from all enemies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>700%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

On any enemy turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to attack the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Block Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on summoned enemy Death, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage

2.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

On any enemy turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to attack the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Block Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On summoned enemy Death, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus

3.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

On any enemy turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to attack the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Block Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On summoned enemy Death, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> when an <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally is attacked
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage

4.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

On any enemy turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to attack the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Block Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On summoned enemy Death, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.
 > Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> when an <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally is attacked.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on the attacked enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>

5.description:
On Turn, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health per non-minion <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally.

On any enemy turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to attack the enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> with the highest Speed, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + in <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, lower the Block Chance of all enemies by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On summoned enemy Death, gain <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy.
 > Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> when an <color=#fff568>ASGARDIAN</color>, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally is attacked.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
